page.description: Create directories recursively in the file system of the mobile device.

argument.name: onComplete
argument.description: A javascript function to call if creating the directory succeeds.

argument.name: onError
argument.description: A javascript function to call if an error occurs when trying to create the directory.

page.discussion: The phoneGapCreateDirectoryRecurse method creates directories recursively in the file system of the mobile device. The method is asynchronous. Calls the onComplete function if the method succeeded. Calls the onError function is the method failed.
